text: We can protect our children. And how about a law that says let’s take any leftover COVID money and harden our schools so that our students & teachers are protected. And going forward let’s redouble our efforts to teach respect responsibility & values. LORD help us to YOUr values

I have a bill that retired law-enforcement could be hired by school districts with no income tax charged so that it was inexpensive for the school & didn’t throw the law enforcement professional into a higher tax bracket We can protect our schools: help me get that bill passed.
